Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CONSUMER PROTECTION
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CONSUMER PROTECTION

Title: Prohibits the sale of xylazine
Summary: Prohibits the knowing sale of xylazine to persons under the age of 21 and without proof of the intended use for institutional, veterinary, or scientific purposes.
LawCode: Add ยง392-k, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting the sale of xylazine
